pkgmetadata.longdescription: CoCoSo - Combined Compromise Solution Method for MCDA // Provides a set of functions to implement the Combined Compromise Solution (CoCoSo) Method created by Yazdani, Zarate, Zavadskas and Turskis (2019) doi:10.1108/MD-05-2017-0458. This method is based on an integrated simple additive weighting and compromise exponentially weighted product model.
